message: I propose a 90/10 split.  It's a fair starting point, considering the inflation difference.
I think a 95/5 split is more fair, considering the inflation rate difference. We can finish this quickly and both get a decent amount.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 85/15. It's still a better deal for me with the inflation, and gives us both more than the last offer.
I'm willing to go back to the 90/10 split from the first round. We're losing money quickly with each passing round, and this is the best way for us to maximize our gains before things get even worse.
